article.title: BAE Systems Wins Contract for Airborne Countermeasures
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: BAE Systems has been awarded a $33.6 million low-rate initial production contract for the ALE-55. The AN/ALE-55 is part of the U.S. Navy's Integrated Defensive Electronic Countermeasures system that provides fighter aircraft with electronic defense against radar guided missiles.
